title: A survey For assignment purpose

embed.description: A survey about gaming and Pokemon Go

body:
Dear Pokemon Go Trainers,
I am a Masters Student studying in University of Adelaide. I am currently conducting a research analysis about consumer's attitude towards Pokemon Go. This is a voluntary participation survey which means you can refuse to proceed with this survey at any point of time. This research is undertaken for assignment purpose therefore it holds no commercial value to it. Nevertheless, the responses given to me will be strictly confidential and will not be exposed to third party. The information obtained will be handed over to my lecturer for assessment purpose. 
This survey will take less than 10 minutes to complete. Your responses are highly valued and important to me and I will greatly appreciate your contribution to my research. 
I thank you in advance for taking the time out of your busy schedule to complete this survey. 
Please find the URL  above which will direct you to the online survey.
Regards 
Shayentri.Bommadevra

replies.body: Wait a second... Wasn't something similar to this on the League and CS:GO reddit pages?
